trans-unit.source: Abstract base class to be implemented by all text to speech synthesis engines.
trans-unit.target: Classe base abstrata para ser implementada por todos os mecanismos de síntese de texto em fala.

trans-unit.source: To construct a custom text to speech engine, an application must always implement a class derived from the abstract base class TtsEngineSsml.
trans-unit.target: Para construir um mecanismo personalizado de texto em fala, um aplicativo sempre deve implementar uma classe derivada da classe base abstrata TtsEngineSsml.

trans-unit.source: A properly registered implementation of TtsEngineSsml can then be used as a `Synthesizer``Voice` by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> name space based applications.
trans-unit.target: Uma implementação corretamente registrada de TtsEngineSsml pode ser usada como um `Synthesizer``Voice` por <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>aplicativos baseados no espaço de nome.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>

trans-unit.source: Objects inheriting from TtsEngineSsml must override the following members: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.%23ctor%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Objetos herdando TtsEngineSsml deve substituir os seguintes membros: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.%23ctor%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The most important member of the TtsEngineSsml class to be implemented is the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O membro mais importante da classe TtsEngineSsml a ser implementada é o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> method is called by the infrastructures text parser receiving: 1.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>método é chamado pelo analisador de texto infraestruturas recebendo: 1.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interface, which provides access to system services such as even queuing and writing audio output.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência para o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>interface, que fornece acesso aos serviços do sistema, como o mesmo serviço de enfileiramento e gravar a saída de áudio.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance produced from Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) input.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>instância produzidos de entrada de linguagem de marcação de síntese de fala (SSML).</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: In addition to text to be rendered as speech, the parsing of the SSML stores information about the requested attributes of the speech in a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instance associated with each incoming <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> object.
trans-unit.target: Texto a ser processado como fala, além de analisar o SSML armazena informações sobre os atributos solicitados de fala em um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>instância associada a cada entrada <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>objeto.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>

trans-unit.source: A speech synthesizer application can optionally make requests for a specified output format by implementing <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A> to be called by the platform when it tries to provide the correct audio output.
trans-unit.target: Um aplicativo do sintetizador de voz, opcionalmente, pode fazer solicitações para um formato de saída especificado implementando <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A>a ser chamado pela plataforma quando ele tenta fornecer a saída de áudio correta.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: An implementer can also provide support for managing external definitions of pronunciations, or lexicons, by their implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Um implementador também pode fornecer suporte para gerenciar definições externas de pronúncia ou dicionários, por sua implementação <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"></xref> based on an appropriate Voice Token registry key.
trans-unit.target: Constrói uma nova instância da <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"> </xref> com base em uma chave de registro de Token de voz apropriada.

trans-unit.source: Full name of the registry key for the Voice Token associated with the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"></xref> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Nome completo da chave do registro para o Token de voz associado com o <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"> </xref> implementação.

trans-unit.source: engine.
trans-unit.target: mecanismo.

trans-unit.source: Adds a lexicon to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Synthesizer" name="Synthesizer" href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_Voice" name="Voice" href=""></xref> implemented by the current <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um léxico para o <xref uid="langword_csharp_Synthesizer" name="Synthesizer" href=""> </xref> <xref uid="langword_csharp_Voice" name="Voice" href=""> </xref> implementado pelo atual <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: A pronunciation lexicon is a collection of words or phrases together with their pronunciations specified using an appropriate pronunciation alphabet.
trans-unit.target: Um léxico pronúncia é uma coleção de palavras ou frases junto com seu pronúncia especificada com uma letra de pronúncia apropriado.

trans-unit.source: This method is typically called by the platform infrastructure in response to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> based applications calling AddLexicon and using the `Synthesizer``Voice` implemented by the current <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> instance.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, esse método é chamado pela infraestrutura de plataforma em resposta a um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>com base em aplicativos chamando AddLexicon e usando o `Synthesizer``Voice` implementado pelo atual <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>instância.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>

trans-unit.source: The value of `mediaType` is typically a MIME specification, as the SSML specification uses MIME for media specifications.
trans-unit.target: O valor de `mediaType` geralmente é uma especificação de MIME, pois a especificação SSML usa MIME para especificações de mídia.

trans-unit.source: A valid instance of <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.Uri" name="System.Uri" href=""></xref> indicating the location of the lexicon information.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância válida do <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.Uri" name="System.Uri" href=""> </xref> que indica o local das informações de léxico.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the media type of the lexicon.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o tipo de mídia do léxico.

trans-unit.source: Media types are case insensitive.
trans-unit.target: Tipos de mídia diferenciam maiusculas de minúsculas.

trans-unit.source: A reference to an <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite"></xref> interface used to interact with the platform infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência a um <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite"> </xref> interface usada para interagir com a infraestrutura da plataforma.

trans-unit.source: Returns the best matching audio output supported by a given synthesize engine response to a request to the synthesizer engine for the support of a particular output format.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a melhor correspondência de saída de áudio com suporte por uma resposta de mecanismo synthesize fornecido a uma solicitação para o mecanismo do sintetizador para suporte a um determinado formato de saída.

trans-unit.source: The structure used as `targetWaveFormat` and returned by the method should compatible with the `WAVEFORMATEX` available under SAPI, and the returned value should be allocated using `CoTaskMemAlloc`.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura usada como `targetWaveFormat` e retornado pelo método deve compatível com o `WAVEFORMATEX` disponível em SAPI, e o valor retornado deve ser alocado usando `CoTaskMemAlloc`.

trans-unit.source: The `struct` must provide functionality equivalent to: ``` internal struct WaveFormat { public Int16 FormatTag; public Int16 Channels; public int SamplesPerSec; public int AvgBytesPerSec; public Int16 BlockAlign; public Int16 BitsPerSample; public Int16 Size; } ```
trans-unit.target: O `struct` deve fornecer a funcionalidade equivalente a:``` internal struct WaveFormat { public Int16 FormatTag; public Int16 Channels; public int SamplesPerSec; public int AvgBytesPerSec; public Int16 BlockAlign; public Int16 BitsPerSample; public Int16 Size; } ```

trans-unit.source: Valid member of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeakOutputFormat"></xref> enumeration indicating the type of requested audio output format.
trans-unit.target: Membro válido do <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeakOutputFormat"> </xref> enumeração que indica o tipo de formato de saída de áudio solicitado.

trans-unit.source: A pointer to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_struct" name="struct" href=""></xref> containing detail setting for the audio format type requested by the `speakOutputFormat` argument.
trans-unit.target: Um ponteiro para um <xref uid="langword_csharp_struct" name="struct" href=""> </xref> que contém a configuração de detalhes para o tipo de formato de áudio solicitado pelo `speakOutputFormat` argumento.

trans-unit.source: Returns a valid <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""></xref> instance referring to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_struct" name="struct" href=""></xref> containing detailed information about the output format.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um válidas <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""> </xref> instância referindo-se a uma <xref uid="langword_csharp_struct" name="struct" href=""> </xref> que contém informações detalhadas sobre o formato de saída.

trans-unit.source: Removes a lexicon currently loaded by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Synthesizer" name="Synthesizer" href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_Voice" name="Voice" href=""></xref> implemented by the current <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Remove um léxico carregado no momento pelo <xref uid="langword_csharp_Synthesizer" name="Synthesizer" href=""> </xref> <xref uid="langword_csharp_Voice" name="Voice" href=""> </xref> implementado pelo atual <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: A pronunciation lexicon is a collection of words or phrases together with their pronunciations specified using an appropriate pronunciation alphabet.
trans-unit.target: Um léxico pronúncia é uma coleção de palavras ou frases junto com seu pronúncia especificada com uma letra de pronúncia apropriado.

trans-unit.source: This method is typically called in response to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> based applications calling <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> and using the `Synthesizer``Voice` implemented by the current <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> instance.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, esse método é chamado em resposta a um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>com base em aplicativos que chamam <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A>e usando o `Synthesizer``Voice` implementado pelo atual <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>instância.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>

trans-unit.source: A valid instance of <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.Uri" name="System.Uri" href=""></xref> indicating the location of the lexicon information.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância válida do <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.Uri" name="System.Uri" href=""> </xref> que indica o local das informações de léxico.

trans-unit.source: A reference to an <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite"></xref> interface passed in by the platform infrastructure to allow access to the infrastructure resources.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência a um <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite"> </xref> interface passado pela infraestrutura de plataforma para permitir o acesso aos recursos de infraestrutura.

trans-unit.source: Renders specified <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> array in the specified output format.
trans-unit.target: Renderiza especificada <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> matriz no formato de saída especificado.

trans-unit.source: The structure used as `waveHeader` and returned by the method should compatible with the `WAVEFORMATEX` available under SAPI.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura usada como `waveHeader` e retornado pelo método deve compatível com o `WAVEFORMATEX` disponível em SAPI.

trans-unit.source: The `struct` must provide functionality equivalent to: ``` internal struct WaveFormat { public Int16 FormatTag; public Int16 Channels; public int SamplesPerSec; public int AvgBytesPerSec; public Int16 BlockAlign; public Int16 BitsPerSample; public Int16 Size; } ```
trans-unit.target: O `struct` deve fornecer a funcionalidade equivalente a:``` internal struct WaveFormat { public Int16 FormatTag; public Int16 Channels; public int SamplesPerSec; public int AvgBytesPerSec; public Int16 BlockAlign; public Int16 BitsPerSample; public Int16 Size; } ```

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> instances containing the text to be rendered into speech.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> instâncias que contém o texto a ser processado para fala.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""></xref> pointing to a structure containing audio output format.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""> </xref> apontando para uma estrutura que contém o formato de saída de áudio.

trans-unit.source: A reference to an <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite"></xref> interface passed in by the platform infrastructure to allow access to the infrastructure resources.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência a um <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite"> </xref> interface passado pela infraestrutura de plataforma para permitir o acesso aos recursos de infraestrutura.
